actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The kapi makes two attacks: one with its quarterstaff and one with its tail trip.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Tail Trip
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Sling
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Nimble Feet
special_abilities.desc: The kapi can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

special_abilities.name: Prehensile Tail
special_abilities.desc: The kapi can use its tail to pick up or hold a small object that isn't being worn or carried. It can use its tail to interact with objects, leaving its hands free to wield weapons or carry heavier objects. The kapi can't use its tail to wield a weapon but can use it to trip an opponent (see below).
